nodes.text: Ryden Pollad was an eccentric starship designer who worked for the starship company Rendili Hyperworks, where the designer developed the BT-7 Thunderclap assault craft for the Republic Army's Special Forces Division. Pollad's style was well known in the galaxy, and the battle droid M1-4X was able to identify the Thunderclap as the work of the Rendili designer immediately upon sighting the vessel.

Ryden Pollad was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011, and the game's 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia identified Pollad's first name. However, neither source specified Pollad's gender or species.
